author: bill
content:
"Obama? A tragic figure, a man who got the Nobel Prize not for what he was or what he did, but only for being successor to the most incompetent president of the US in more than a century."

Not the most intelligent post, but then, you're not exactly the sharpest pencil in the box, eh?

Just try to keep making decent images...  That's a speed you can realistically aspire to.  No?
